name: Fantasy Coma V0.1
description:
***Disclaimer: This game contains strong language, and touches disturbing subjects. It is not suitable for children of course.

This game is a short comical psychological  Adventure game (well, a short demo).
It does not involve any combat, and focused on the story, exploration and last but not least, making decisions with consequences.

Controls:

Walk with the arrow keys, "Shift" to run and "Enter" or "space" to interact with objects or talk to NPCs.

*The music and art is all original and created by me.
